game.name: Finger Driver
game.description:
Are you a lover of car driving? If yes, you must try out this brand new racing game where you would get a chance to explore multiple car options. Use your mouse on desktop and tap the screen on mobile phone to control your character. Take your seat behind the steering wheel of your favorite car and get ready to drive your vehicle on the curved road! It will be your duty to keep it on the road and grab the coins that you find on your way. 

Do not bother about the controls since it is very easy to handle. Use the left and right arrow key or tap the screen to control the direction of your car in this html5 car game! Drive around bends and avoid all the obstacles that you see on your way! Be careful and try to drive as far as possible and collect as many coins as you can to upgrade the fanciness of your car! Make your vehicle keep balance and drive on a track

Guide your vehicle through a series of tracks that are full of multiple types of obstacles in this intense arcade driving game! Do not take a risk while avoiding hitting the neon sides. Keep your eyes on the screen to grab the gold coins when you drive your car around each track! Choose a super magnet that is determined to attract the maximum number of gold coins in this fun driving game! You would have different cool new car models to select from. Enjoy alone or with your friends, no download required!
